summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: MEICOLY 12 Pcs/set Matte Lipstick Set Long Lasting Waterproof Pen Lip Stain Set Halloween Review Date: 2020/09/20 Store: MEICOLY Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MEICOLY', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Target Audience': 'Unisex-Adults', 'UPC': '782910237119'} Review Text: This lipsticks colors looks good, They are cheap and have an off scent to them. and tried testing those lipsticks but after hour I felt irritation so I don't suggest for everyone, Make sure before use. Review Title: Okay! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Whisper 90mL, a skin caressing floral Eau De Parfum for Women with calm base notes of Musk, delicate Fruity middle tones by perfume artisan Swiss Arabian Review Date: 2020/11/15 Store: Swiss Arabian Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Swiss Arabian', 'Item Volume': '90 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Fragrance Concentration': 'Eau_de_parfum', 'Item Weight': '0.8 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.15 x 3.15 inches; 12.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '769471301275'} Review Text: The bottle is very pretty and Beautiful packaging!, It smells really good but scent doesn't last long. I'm having to reapply throughout the day. So I took one star for the reason. I hate that I have to use so much to keep the scent all day.. It is not overpowering, I love this fresh fragrance. Review Title: Very Nice!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YARELI Organic Castor Oil for Eyelashes, Eyebrows, Hair, Skin and Body - Cold Pressed and Unrefined, 12oz Review Date: 2021/05/07 Store: YARELI Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Fragrance free', 'Liquid Volume': '12 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'YARELI', 'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 2.36 x 2.2 inches; 12 Ounces'} Review Text: While castor oil has many beauty benefits like hair growth, I have only ever used it for health reasons. For constipation you can take cloth soak it in castor oil, wrap your abdomen and use a heating pad to help you have bowel movements or do the same thing in achy joints to relieve pain.
Castor oil is Amazing! Review Title: very pleased with outcome!! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Water Flosser,USB Rechargeable 3 Modes Water Flosser,IPX7 Waterproof,Professional Cordless Dental Oral Irrigator,Braces Cleanner with 220Ml Cleanable Water Tank (White) Review Date: 2021/07/26 Store: WZCICHEN Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'WZCICHEN', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Multiple Operation Modes', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Color': 'White', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '8.27 x 2.28 x 2.28 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '8.27 x 2.28 x 2.28 inches; 13.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'wt-6888', 'Manufacturer': 'WZCICHEN'} Review Text: Having owned water flossers in the past and not being happy with them I wasn't sure what to expect but decided to give it a shot. I'm actually pleased with this as it is cordless, quieter than the old ones I had and easy to handle. The worst problem is the operator who occasionally forgets to turn it off before removing from her mouth....hmm, might be good in a water pistol fight....or it might put someone's eye out so maybe not. Possible other uses (since it is so portable) could be to scrub a difficult to reach spot or clean a small item. Perhaps I should buy a second for such purposes.!! Review Title: Very nice like it! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Jagat Almond Hair Oil 13.6 Oz. Combo Pack | with Vitamin E Nourishment Non Sticky and Non Greasy for Silkier & Strong Hair - (Pack of 2, 6.8 Oz X 2) Review Date: 2021/11/12 Store: JAGAT Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Dry,Frizz', 'Scent': 'Almond', 'Liquid Volume': '6.8 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'JAGAT', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 2.6 x 2.2 inches; 13.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'JGT-HAIROIL-ALMND-P2'} Review Text: I have been experiencing major hair loss, along with dry , frizzy hair - caused by hard water, dry climate, and maybe stress. The first time I tried it, it felt a little too thick, and unwieldy to apply. I was definitely able to apply and massage it on my scalp. I left it overnight and hair was definitely softer on washing. Review Title: Works fine for me! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a consumer who values affordable beauty and wellness products, often balancing price sensitivity with quality expectations. They display a preference for skin and hair care items, highlighting a focus on moisturizing and nourishing benefits. Their purchases indicate they gravitate towards products that deliver practical health benefits, evidenced by the use of castor oil for medicinal purposes and the appreciation for portable tools like the water flosser. 

The individual shows an inclination for items with moderate to high ratings (3.6-5.0) but expresses concern about certain product qualities, such as lingering scents or effectiveness over time. The beauty products selected often have a matte finish or natural feel, suggesting a preference for understated aesthetics. Additionally, they prioritize functional packaging and ease of use over luxurious marketing. 

Overall, this person leans towards practicality and efficacy in their choices, valuing products that support a holistic approach to self-care. There is also an evident desire for products that maintain a balance between natural ingredients and effective results, indicating a conscientious consumption pattern.

target_interaction.title: Do not hesitate to buy!!
target_interaction.text:
Do not hesitate, you will appreciate your purchase! I kept changing my bathing soap over last few years! From Dove greasy soaps to all those acne soaps that leave the skin dry, red, and allergic!
With a couple of use I felt difference! My skin felt clean but at the same time alive and fresh! Now it has been a month using it, my acne decreased significantly! The scent is not too high which is actually good proves low chemical ingredients! I am definitely reordering it!
target_interaction.title_meta: Dead Sea Mud Soap,125gr, Minerals & Salt Spa Skincare for Multi Skin Disorders Natural Treatment for Face & All Body, Natural Beauty Care, All Skin types, Perfect for Oily Skin Treatment, Smooth Face & Body Within 5-10 Min
